newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CNB FIXES CROWN +1.76 PCT VS MARK/USD BASKET.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CNB FIXES CROWN +1.76 PCT VS MARK/USD BASKET.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown on Tuesday at 28.926 to the dollar after Friday's fixing at 29.096, and at 17.343 to the mark from 17.353.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +1.76 percent, after a deviation of +1.52 on Friday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +1.71 percent.

The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT during summer time change), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
